In this tutorial we are going to create a desktop notifier using R and [Notifier](https://github.com/gaborcsardi/notifier) package.
Notifier package is available on Github and below is the method to download and install a package from Github.

```{r,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

#install.packages("devtools") if devtools is not installed
devtools::install_github("gaborcsardi/notifier")
library(notifier)

```
